p: To date, few studies have been performed on human samples. A screening study of human serum samples showed that 1.3% of the general population had antibody titres against IDV [ 1], while in Scotland no evidence of IDV infection emerged from the analysis of archived respiratory samples [ 29]. However, a serological study conducted in Florida reported a seroprevalence of 94% among workers exposed to cattle (32/35 samples) [ 30].
